title: Payment calculator
description: LOFT-LIKE STUDIO with HIGH CEILINGS at 11' and OVERSIZED WINDOWS and EXPOSED BRICK adding Charm to the Entire Apartment. & nbsp;   & nbsp; A Renovated Kitchen with Stainless Appliances & nbsp; and Granite Counters make at home meals easy to prepare. & nbsp; In addition a Built-in Murphy Bed gives you more space in your Living/Dining Area. & nbsp; A Lofted Area with 4' headroom adds either a guest sleeping area or more storage space. & nbsp; In addition an enormous Walk-in Closet offers you the extra storage for all your daily storage needs and a Newly Renovated Bathroom makes this apartment Move-In Ready. & nbsp; The Building has a Beautifully Planted Roof Deck and is completing its long awaited Courtyard Project. & nbsp; Also Washer/Dryers on every floor and & nbsp; a Helpful and Friendly Super and His Assistant for all your needs.   & nbsp; Waverly Place is in a Prime Village Location providing easy access to great shopping along University Avenue just around the corner and the newer and large Wegman's offering a great take out food section as well as a large Supermarket on the lower level. & nbsp; In addition all major subway lines are easily accessible. & nbsp; Pets are welcomed in this Building.  Email or call for immediate appointments to view this move-in ready Apartment. & nbsp; Your New Home Awaits You in this Incredible Downtown Location.
